name: Sinewave Samurai
description:
千切って！！正弦波の侍対烏天狗の無限の軍隊

Controls

  • Left & Right to focus your blade
  • Space / Z / . / Controller Face Buttons to strike
  • Left Shift / X / ? / Controller Shoulder Buttons to focus more intensely
  • Escape to try again or quit

"a wonderful marriage of eye catching aesthetics and simple design" - Kotaku

Made for Global Game Jam 2017. Jam theme: "waves".

Special thanks to Taxiderby for help with Japanese

Special thanks to my Patreon backers!

The Japanese number counter was written during the jam, and I didn't have time to fully test it. Apologies if it gets some numbers wrong!
